name: Diglett
flavorText: Lives about three feet underground, where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground. LV. 8 #50

strengths: Zero retreat cost provides unmatched mobility and flexibility
Strong Lightning resistance (-30) effectively nullifies most Lightning attacks
Mud Slap deals impressive 30 damage for a Basic Pokemon
Dig requires only 1 Fighting energy for quick early-game pressure
Evolves into Dugtrio for increased power
weaknesses: Extremely low 30 HP makes it vulnerable to being one-hit KO'd
Must commit 2 Fighting energy for Mud Slap, which is substantial for such low HP
No defensive abilities to protect its fragile body
synergies: Defender can provide crucial damage reduction to help Diglett survive
PlusPower boosts attacks to 20 and 40 damage respectively
Gust of Wind can bring out weak Pokemon for Diglett to knock out with Mud Slap
Pokemon Center synergizes with free retreat - heal Diglett and bring it back to active
counters: Pokemon with higher HP that can tank Mud Slap
